articles.title: Talks between Kim Yong Nam and S. R. Nathan Held
articles.content:
Talks between Kim Yong Nam and S. R. Nathan Held
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- Talks were held between Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, and S. R. Nathan, President of Singapore, at the Singaporean presidential palace on May 7.
					 At the talks Nathan said that the DPRK was one of those countries that recognized the Republic of Singapore before any others, expressing belief that the friendly relations between the two countries developing on good terms would grow stronger in the future, too.
					
					 At the talks both sides exchanged views on boosting the friendly relations between the two countries and a series of matters of mutual concern.

articles.title: Banquet Given for Kim Yong Nam
articles.content:
Banquet Given for Kim Yong Nam
 Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- S. R. Nathan, President of Singapore, gave a banquet in honor of Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, at the presidential palace on May 7.
					 Present there on invitation were President Kim Yong Nam, Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kim Hyong Jun, DPRK Ambassador to Singapore Jong Song Il and other suite members.
					
					 President S. R. Nathan, S. Iswaran, senior minister of state for Trade and Industry, Tan Eng Beng, chief secretary of the President, and other officials concerned were on hand. 
					
					 The banquet proceeded in an amicable atmosphere.

articles.title: Spokesman for DPRK Foreign Ministry Blasts U.S. Invariable Hostile Policy towards It
articles.content:
Spokesman for DPRK Foreign Ministry Blasts U.S. Invariable Hostile Policy towards It
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA Friday as regards the U.S. administration's recent tendency toward the DPRK:
					 The study of the policy pursued by the Obama administration for the past 100 days since its emergence made it clear that the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK remains unchanged. 
					
					 It is the essence of the U.S. persistent hostile policy toward the DPRK to eliminate the ideology and bring down the system, both chosen by its people.
					
					 The present U.S. president called for "proper punishment", describing the DPRK's launch of satellite for peaceful purposes as "a challenge" and "provocation" while the secretary of State is repeating such malignant vituperation let loose by the preceding government as slandering the system in the DPRK as a "tyrannical" and "rogue regime" and the like.
					
					 The attitude of the present U.S. administration is not confined to those outbursts. No sooner had the Obama administration emerged than busied itself staging the largest-ever Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises in and around south Korea in March, seriously threatening the security of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. referred the issue of the DPRK's launch of satellite for peaceful purposes to the UNSC and thus made it apply sanctions against it in a bid to physically stifle its national defence industry.
					
					 Nothing would be expected from the U.S. which remains unchanged in its hostility toward its dialogue partner.
					
					 The measures taken by the DPRK recently to bolster its national defence capability are aimed not to draw attention of someone and have dialogue with it but to defend the security of the country and the sovereignty of the nation.
					
					 The DPRK will bolster its nuclear deterrent as it has already clarified.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-DPRK Farce Flailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-DPRK Farce Flailed
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Red Cross Society of the DPRK in a statement on Friday termed the recent "invitation and consolation of separated families" of the Lee Myung Bak group in the wake of the similar event last year a tricky farce prompted by its shameless and foolish intention to give impression that it is interested in the issue of "separated families", justify its moves for confrontation with fellow countrymen and flee from the responsibility for the bedeviled inter-Korean relations.
					 Those who barred the solution of the inter-Korean humanitarian issues and pushed the inter-Korean relations which were advancing toward reconciliation, unity and peace and reunification to confrontation and the brink of a war are talking about "pain of separated families" and "consolation". This is an unbearable mockery and insult to all the Koreans including the separated families and relatives in the north and the south who have suffered untold pain due to the division of the nation, the statement says, and goes on:
					
					 Due to the Lee group's moves for confrontation against the DPRK not only the north-south relations but the foundations of humanitarian cooperation have been completely destroyed, further beclouding the prospects.
					
					 The prevailing situation clearly proves that as long as the Lee group stays in power it would be impossible to expect the improved inter-Korean relations and Red Cross and humanitarian undertakings including reunion of separated families and relatives, adding to the misfortune and pain of fellow countrymen.
					
					 The Lee group should stop the foolish anti-DPRK smear campaign and confrontational moves, mindful that its afore-said vicious anti-DPRK racket would only precipitate its ignominious destruction.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations Arrive
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations Arrive
 Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the China-Korea Friendship Association led by Chairman Wu Donghe and a local government delegation of China headed by Vice-Chairman of the Sichuan Provincial People's Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries Wang Xian, grouping delegates of the people's government from the provinces of Jiangxi, Shandong, Sichuan and the cities of Shanghai, Jilin, Hunchun, Tianjin and Changchun arrived here today to participate in a meeting of the Korea-China friendship city. 
					 A delegation of the China Council for the Promotion of International Trade and the China Chamber of International Commerce headed by Vice-Chairman Wang Jinzhen arrived here on the same day to participate in the 12th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair.
					
					 Also arriving today was a delegation of the Swedish International Development Cooperation Agency led by AnnaMaria Oltorp, head of Regional Team for Asia.

articles.title: Efficacious Injection for Hepatitis
articles.content:
Efficacious Injection for Hepatitis
 Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- Chonggan-Baikal injection for the treatment of liver diseases has been developed and applied to treatment in the DPRK.
					 The injection is made with main active properties extracted by dint of the latest technology from Scutellaria baicalensis which had been used to cure liver disorders traditionally. It is potent for the treatment of chronic and acute hepatitis, cirrhosis and liver ascites.
					
					 The injection with a short curative period gives no pain to patients when injecting and is of beauty efficacy such as removing freckles and blotches on face caused by liver troubles.  It enjoys popularity among the users for its treatment scope and efficacy greater than other drugs for improving liver function.
					
					 Through clinical practice, the injection is recognized as a promising Koryo medicine with high stability and no medicinal accumulation.

articles.title: Devotedly Defending Leader Is Proud Tradition of Korean Revolution
articles.content:
Devotedly Defending Leader Is Proud Tradition of Korean Revolution
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- The Korean army and people, who have always emerged victorious in the chronicle of the revolution, have a glorious tradition of defending the leader with their own lives.
					 This is well shown by the slogans held aloft by them in each historical stage of the development of the revolution.
					
					 The anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters, the first generation of the Korean revolution, guided by the slogan "Let us defend the headquarters of the revolution with our very lives!", became a citadel and a shield in defending President Kim Il Sung in each battle with the Japanese imperialists armed to the teeth.
					
					 Carrying forward this tradition, the soldiers of the Korean People's Army dedicated their youth and lives without hesitation in the hard-fought Fatherland Liberation War, shouting the slogan "For the Party and the leader!"
					
					 In the crucial post-war period, when the enemies within and without became outspoken in their moves and renegades to the revolution challenged the Party and the revolution, the Korean working class supported the Party's idea and line of economic construction with high rates of increased production, displaying the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance, closely united around the President under the slogan "Let us defend with our very lives the Party Central Committee headed by Comrade Kim Il Sung!"
					
					 In the later period, they fought in the self-sacrificing spirit for the victorious advance of the Juche-oriented revolutionary cause, upholding the slogan "Let us fight devotedly for the great leader!" 
					
					 The revolutionary spirit of devoted defense displayed by the forerunners is represented in the slogan "Let us defend with our very lives the leadership of revolution headed by the great Comrade Kim Jong Il!" in the Songun era to serve as the banner of life and struggle of the  army and people.
					
					 The spirit of devotedly defending the leader steadily carried forward through decades and centuries invariably remains the life and soul and motto of the Korean army and people today.
					
					 The Korean army and people, holding aloft the banner of devotedly defending the leader, are keeping the death-defying resolution to mercilessly punish the enemies, if they invade an inch of the sky, the land and the sea of the DPRK.

articles.title: KCNA Warns Japan Not to Go Reckless
articles.content:
KCNA Warns Japan Not to Go Reckless
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- Very ill-boding is the call for the "possession of offensive capability" frequently heard from Japan now.
					 The recent talkfest for working out "new defence program outlines", sponsored by the Aso government, dealt mainly with the issue of examining Japan's "possession of capability for attacking enemy bases" simulating a "preemptive attack" on the DPRK.
					
					 There former Prime Minister Abe and dietmen of both houses from the Liberal Democratic Party asserted that "it is necessary to hold discussion on the exercise of the right to collective self-defence and possession of the capability for attacking enemy bases," "Japan's possession of such capability is not in contravention of constitution if it is within the scope of the right to self-defence" and "the time is mature for taking into consideration the attack on enemy bases."
					
					 Timed to coincide with this, Deputy Chief Cabinet Secretary Konoike on May 3 blustered the need to revise Article 9 of Japan's constitution so as to stipulate the existence of the "Self-Defence Forces".
					
					 Such actions show that the Japanese reactionaries' anti-DPRK moves are being intensified to stage a comeback to the Korean Peninsula with the present situation there as a good opportunity.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries unreasonably designated the DPRK's satellite launching ground for peaceful purposes as a target of "enemy bases to be attacked." This is lashing the army and people of the DPRK into a great fury.
					
					 Japan is now getting evermore pronounced in the hostile moves against the DPRK while misinterpreting the DPRK's satellite launch as a "missile launch."
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are whipping up war hysteria, planning wartime actual maneuvers of the SDF and examining their alert posture as if they had waited for the opportunity to happen. They have thrown off the signboard of "defence" to get themselves ready for mounting practical "attack."
					
					 The theory of "attacking enemy bases" touted by them is just the theory of a war for staging a comeback to Korea.
					
					 The completion of "emergency legislation" for prompt and efficient "counteraction" in case of "emergency in areas surrounding Japan" with the main stress laid on "event of contingency in the Korean Peninsula," the formation and deployment of SDF combat units and frequent military exercises of the SDF in the sea east of Korea are all part of the preparations for reinvasion of Korea.
					
					 The Japanese militarists' scheme to realize their ambition for reinvasion by way of reckless preemptive attack started long ago.
					
					 Japan already conducted "mock preemptive attack" in the 1990s under the pretext of "countering missile attack" from the DPRK. The then Japan Defence Agency increased attack capability after confirming ASDF's ability of collecting information and carrying out an electronic warfare through it.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' undisguised "theory about attack on enemy bases" proves the danger of their attempt at reinvasion in practice.
					
					 The Japan Defence Ministry recently worked out "basic policy for development and use of outer space" and included in it an article stipulating that Japan shall kick off researches into the development of early warning satellite capable of immediately detecting "enemy state's" ballistic missile launch. This is an extension of such reinvasion scheme.
					
					 "Missile launch" and "threat to regional security" much touted by Japan are nothing but a trick to cover up its aggression design.
					
					 As already clarified more than once, there is nothing questionable in the DPRK's space activities for peaceful purposes as they are part of the worldwide efforts to explore space. It is, therefore, illogical for Japan to talk about "attack."
					
					 The DPRK's missile program does never pose any threat to those countries which are not hostile toward the DPRK because it is a self-defensive measure to protect the security of the country.
					
					 If Japan continues acting rashly to dare infringe upon the dignity of the DPRK and its people in disregard of the said stand, it will meet only merciless punishment.

articles.title: Koreans Called upon to Force Japan to Pay for Blood Shed by Them
articles.content:
Koreans Called upon to Force Japan to Pay for Blood Shed by Them
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- The Korean people consider Japan as a militarist viper and the most ferocious and shameless aggressor and plunderer and their sworn enemy. This is not their temporary feeling but their deep-rooted view on Japan. Rodong Sinmun Friday observes this in a signed article.
					 This represents the Korean people's firm determination and will to force Japan to pay for the blood shed by them under any circumstances, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The DPRK-Japan hostile relations remain unsettled although much water has flown under the bridge. This is due to Japan's hostile policy toward the DPRK. 
					
					 The article cites facts to prove that Japan has worked with bloodshot eyes to hurt the DPRK even in the new century as it did in the past. 
					
					 The article goes on: 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' hostile policy toward the DPRK is little different from what the Japanese imperialists committed against Korea after invading it in the past. They have become more crafty and persistent in their methods. 
					
					 The general goal of Japan's reactionary foreign policy is to isolate and stifle the DPRK and Japan is channeling everything into this objective. 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries, seized by hysteria for overseas aggression, are directing their militarist spearhead to the DPRK, considering that there is international environment favorable for conducting military operations independently at present.
					
					 If the Japanese militarists are allowed to go reckless, buoyed by the wild ambition to stage a comeback to Korea, they will opt to seriously violate the sovereignty of the DPRK and dignity of the nation. Japan still remains the sworn enemy of the Korean people. No change should be expected from the Japanese militarists. Only just strong countermeasure should be taken against them.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will bolster the defence capability of the country by giving full play to the might of Songun with towering resentment against Japan and the firm pledge to take revenge upon it. Should the Japanese reactionaries dare make a military provocation against them, they will mete out a merciless punishment to them.

articles.title: Pro-Japanese Lackey's Behavior Slashed
articles.content:
Pro-Japanese Lackey's Behavior Slashed
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- Puppet Defense Minister Ri Sang Hui at the recent "talks" with his Japanese counterpart cried out for "boosting solidarity" among the U.S., Japan and south Korea in the efforts to force the DPRK to "dismantle its nukes" and signed the south Korea-Japan "protocol on defense exchange."
					 Minju Joson today observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 This was a hideous act of treachery perpetrated by a pro-Japanese stooge to do harm to the fellow countrymen in collusion with the sworn enemy of the nation.
					
					 No sooner had Ri Sang Hui become the said minister than worked with bloodshot eyes to stand in confrontation with compatriots. His call for pressurizing the "north to dismantle its nukes" fully reveals once again his true colors as a sycophant and traitor keen to do harm to fellow countrymen in league with outsiders.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 He is the top-class traitor serving Japan who should be eliminated without delay. This traitor to the nation is still hell-bent on confrontation with compatriots and treachery, with his head raised, as he is backed by traitor Lee Myung Bak.
					
					 It is impossible to defend the sovereignty and dignity of the nation nor is it possible to improve the inter-Korean relations and achieve national reunification as long as the group of such traitors is allowed to stay in power.
					
					 Lee and his group had better stop the reckless anti-DPRK racket at once, mindful that the enemies of the nation are fated to go to ruin.

articles.title: Songun Politics Praised as Banner for Shaping Nation's Destiny
articles.content:
Songun Politics Praised as Banner for Shaping Nation's Destiny
 Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- The Songun politics is the just politics of national independence and noble patriotism as it helps firmly defend the sovereignty of the nation and the peace of the country from any encroachment by the imperialist aggressors and their followers and vigorously pave the way for national reunification.
					 Rodong Sinmun stresses this in a signed article today.
					
					 The Songun politics pursued by the Workers' Party of Korea serves as the most powerful independent politics firmly protecting the national dignity and sovereignty and opening up the road to development and prosperity, the shield of patriotism reliably guarding the peace of the Korean Peninsula and the security of the nation from outsiders' aggression and the great banner and powerful engine for independent reunification, the article says, and goes on:
					
					The national strength has been built up to the maximum and the country sees its golden era of prosperity, unprecedented in the nation's history spanning 5,000 years. This is a clear proof of the validity of Songun politics and its invincible vitality, and nobody can encroach upon the sovereignty and dignity of the Korean nation. The invincible arms of Songun are a dependable guarantee for the nation's sovereignty, dignity, development and prosperity.
					
					 It is due to the DPRK's arms of Songun demonstrating their invincible might as a peace-keeping treasured sword that the hostile forces at home and abroad dare not mount a preemptive attack on it though so acute military confrontation is persisting in the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 If the DPRK was weak in military strength, a war would have already broken out in the peninsula. It is entirely thanks to the DPRK's powerful arms of Songun that peace has been kept in the peninsula so far and the people in the north and the south have led a stable life.
					
					 The DPRK's Songun politics is run through with the rock-firm will and unshakable determination of the WPK to reject the aggressive foreign forces and surely achieve the independent reunification by the united efforts of the Koreans, as desired by the fellow countrymen.
					
					 This politics instills the Koreans with optimism and confidence in national reunification and the future of one Korea and whips up their national pride and self-esteem.
					
					 As long as the Songun politics, a symbol of independence and dignity, is pursued, the nation's desire for independent reunification and peace and prosperity will be realized without fail.

articles.title: Holding High Banner of Theory of Ideology Called for
articles.content:
Holding High Banner of Theory of Ideology Called for
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday in an editorial article calls for vigorously advancing toward the eminence of a great prosperous and powerful nation under the banner of theory of ideology indicated by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The theory that ideology decides everything is the starting point of building a great prosperous and powerful nation and it serves as a banner guaranteeing its ultimate victory, the article notes, adding that it is the stand of the Workers' Party of Korea that the might of ideology should be given full play whenever it faces vast and urgent economic tasks.
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 When the might of the country grows and the socialist system is consolidated, the issue of ideology presents itself as all the more important one.
					
					 The Juche-based theory of ideology is a powerful ideological and theoretical weapon whose importance is further increasing in the IT era in the 21st century.
					
					 What one should guard against in particular in the IT age is the tendency of disregarding the might of ideology, overwhelmed by technology-and science-almighty theory. It is impossible to develop science and technology when the might of ideology is disregarded. Ideology is above science and technology.
					
					 Scientists and technicians of the DPRK accurately put satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 into orbit by carrier rocket Unha-2 and the workers of Kangson built a modern UHP electric arc furnace by their own efforts and with their own technology even under the most arduous and difficult conditions. This would have been unthinkable without the might of ideology and morality.
					
					 The Juche-oriented theory of ideology serves as an invincible treasured sword which helps the people display their greater might in the present times when a fierce anti-imperialist class struggle is underway.
					
					 The DPRK has achieved decisive victory by driving the U.S. imperialists to a tight corner in all the fields of politics, military affair, economy and diplomacy in recent years. This was possible not because it had a strong material potential. The political and ideological might of the DPRK was the source of strength which helped it foil the strategy for stifling the DPRK invented by those imperialists styling themselves strategists and the unprecedented blockade committed by them.
					
					 The Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il is one which embodies the theory of ideology and the Songun era is one that advances by the invincible ideological and moral power. The might of the Songun politics lies in that it arms all the people with the revolutionary soldier spirit and defends and glorifies socialism by dint of it. The Songun politics is based on the unity of the army and people in thinking and will.
					
					 The environment of the Korean revolution still remains difficult and complicated but the DPRK has such invincible weapon as the theory of ideology.
					
					 The Korean people have fully equipped with the revolutionary soldier spirit, the most revolutionary and militant idea and spirit in our era, going through thick and thin during the "Arduous March." The strong mentality they have built generation after generation helped bring about a fresh great Songun revolutionary surge.
					
					 The stirring reality today eloquently proves that there is nothing impossible for the Korean people and they can win everything when the might of ideology is given full play.
					
					 A rosy future of a great prosperous and powerful nation looms ahead of them, the article says, stressing that ultimate victory is in store for the party, army and people of the DPRK struggling guided by the theory of ideology.

articles.title: National Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Venezuela
articles.content:
National Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Venezuela
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- A national seminar on the Juche idea took place in Guarico State, Venezuela, on April 24.
					Chairman Omar Lopez and the secretary general of the Venezuelan National Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, Chairman of the Venezuela-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association Antonio Ribero and other speakers praised the immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung who accomplished the cause of building the party, the army and the state and defeated the two imperialisms in one generation, explaining in depth the validity and vitality of the Juche idea.
					
					 They expressed support and solidarity with the DPRK's decision to bolster up the nuclear deterrent after its successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong-2.
					
					 Announced at the seminar was a declaration on the principles to be adhered to by the Venezuelan organizations for the study of the Juche idea and friendship and solidarity with the Korean people.
					
					 The declaration stressed the need to widely introduce the achievements and experience of the DPRK, which has firmly defended the sovereignty of the country and the nation by steadily maintaining its principled stand in the international arena to strike the world progressives with wonder, and activate the study and dissemination of the Juche idea.
					
					 It also called for promoting the development of Venezuela-DPRK relations and expanding exchange in various fields between the two countries.
					
					A message to General Secretary Kim Jong Il was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Juche Idea Study Group Formed in Venezuela
articles.content:
Juche Idea Study Group Formed in Venezuela
 Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- The Guarico State, Venezuela, Group for the Study of the Juche Idea was formed on April 24.
					 The group includes academic figures of Venezuela.

articles.title: DPRK's April Holidays Commemorated in Mexico
articles.content:
DPRK's April Holidays Commemorated in Mexico
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- Mexican organizations issued bulletins on April 26 on the occasions of the 16th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and the 77th birthday of the heroic Korean People's Army.
					 The Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea in its bulletin carried a photograph of Kim Jong Il inspecting a KPA unit. 
					
					 The bulletin in an article said that the inspection of a unit of the KPA made by Kim Jong Il on January 1, 1995 when the Korean people were facing indescribable difficulties helped the world know better about his will to defend the peace on the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia and socialism chosen by the people of the DPRK to the last.  
					
					 It noted that the situation on the peninsula has not developed as desired by the United States since the demise of the Cold War, attributing this to the leadership of Kim Jong Il, the guardian of peace and justice. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il inspected many units of the KPA to bolster up its combat capability in every way from forefront posts to posts on remote islets, the bulletin stressed.
					
					 It recalled that Kim Jong Il formulated the Songun politics as the main political mode of socialism and the revolutionary soldier spirit is prevailing throughout the society, bringing about signal successes in all fields of socialist construction.  No force on earth can provoke the DPRK at present when it is expected to turn into a thriving nation before long, it added.
					
					 The Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism in an article of its bulletin noted that the KPA has been prepared to successfully accomplish and reliably defend the socialist cause under the wise leadershipof Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Socialism in the DPRK is sure to triumph thanks to the KPA playing vanguard role in all fabrics of society, it stressed.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con el presidente de Singapur
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con el presidente de Singapur
Pyongyang, 8 de mayo (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, sostuvo conversaciones el dia 7 en el palacio presidencial con el presidente de la Republica de Singapur, S. R. Nathan.
					  En la ocasion el presidente singapureno dijo que la RPDC es uno de los paises que reconocieron primero a la Republica de Singapur y expreso la conviccion de que en lo adelante tambien, se fortalecerian y se desarrollarian las relaciones de amistad entre ambos paises que se desarrollan positivamente.
					
					  Ambas partes intercambiaron las opiniones sobre la ampliacion y el desarrollo de las relaciones bilaterales de amistad y otros problemas de interes mutuo.

articles.title: S. R. Nathan ofrece banquete en honor de Kim Yong Nam
articles.content:
S. R. Nathan ofrece banquete en honor de Kim Yong Nam
Pyongyang, 8 de mayo (ATCC) -- El presidente de la Republica de Singapur, S. R. Nathan, ofrecio el dia 7 en el Palacio Presidencial un banquete en honor del presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam.
					  A la comida fueron invitados el presidente Kim Yong Nam, el vicecanciller Kim Hyong Jun, el embajador coreano en Singapur Jong Song Il y otros acompanantes.
					
					  Estuvieron presentes aqui el presidente de Singapur S. R. Nathan, el ministro de estado para el Comercio e Industria S. Iswaran,  el secretario responsable del presidente Tan Eng Beng y otros interesados.
					
					  El banquete transcurrio en un ambiente rebosante de amabilidad.

articles.title: MINREX: no hay ningun cambio en la politica hostil de EE.UU. a RPDC
articles.content:
MINREX: no hay ningun cambio en la politica hostil de EE.UU. a RPDC
Pyongyang, 8 de mayo (ATCC) -- En entrevista exclusiva con la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea en cuanto a la actual postura de la administracion norteamericana sobre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio este viernes la siguiente respuesta:
					 Segun observamos la tendencia de la politica de la administracion Obama durante los 100 dias despues de su aparicion, quedo evidente que no hubo ni el mas minimo cambio en su politica hostil a la RPDC.
					
					 Lo esencial de esta politica persistente hasta la fecha radica en la eliminacion de la idea y el sistema optados por nuestro pueblo.
					
					 El actual presidente norteamericano insiste en imponer el "castigo merecido" calificando de "desafio" y "provocacion" el lanzamiento del satelite artificial ejecutado por nuestro pais con fines pacificos.
					
					 Mientras tanto, la secretaria de Estado repite literalmente los improperios hostiles a nuestro regimen, que solian pronunciar los anteriores ejecutivos, tales como "tirania" y "poder bribon".
					
					 La tendencia hostil a Corea de la actual administracion norteamericana no se limita a tales chismes.
					
					 Tan pronto como asumiera el poder, la administracion Obama amenazo seriamente la seguridad de nuestro pais al librar en marzo ultimo en el Sur de Corea y su contorno los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho" de una dimension sin precedente.
					
					  Como parte de sus maniobras para eliminar fisicamente nuestra industria de defensa nacional, planteo al Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU el problema del lanzamiento de nuestro satelite artificial pacifico y llevo a efecto la sancion.
					
					 No conseguiremos nada aunque dialoguemos con esa contraparte que nos hostiliza invariablemente.
					
					 Nuestras ultimas medidas para consolidar el poderio de defensa nacional no son para llamar la atencion de alguien e inducirlo al dialogo sino para defender la seguridad del pais y la soberania nacional.
					
					 Como ya hemos aclarado, seguiremos fortaleciendo nuestro disuasivo nuclear.

articles.title: ACR critica la farsa de la banda de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
ACR critica la farsa de la banda de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 8 de mayo (ATCC) -- Al igual que en el ano pasado, la banda de Lee Myung Bak celebro recientemente otra vez el "acto de invitacion y consuelo a los familiares separados" quienes tienen a sus consanguineos en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					 Al publicar este viernes una declaracion, el portavoz del Comite Central de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de la RPDC lo califico de otra payasada picara de esa horda que partio del descarado y necio intento de enganar a la opinion publica como si ella estuviera muy interesada por el problema de los "familiares separados", justificar su campana de confrontacion fratricida y eludir su responsabilidad de haber empeorado las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					 Quienes hablan hipocritamente del "dolor de los familiares separados" y el "consuelo" son justamente los culpables que impidieron la solucion de los problemas humanitarios entre ambas partes coreanas y llevaron a la confrontacion y la coyuntura de guerra las relaciones Norte-Sur, que tomaban rumbo a la reconciliacion, la unidad, la paz y la reunificacion, senala la nota y continua:
					
					 Esto es insoportable burla e insulto a los familiares y parientes, que viven separados en el Norte y el Sur de Corea, y los demas coreanos que sufren indecibles penalidades a causa de la division nacional.
					
					  Debido a la campana de enfrentamiento con la RPDC lanzada por la banda de Lee, hoy dia, quedaron quebrados totalmente el fundamento de las relaciones intercoreanas y la base de las labores de cooperacion humanitaria y se hacen cada vez mas tenebrosas las perspectivas de las mismas.
					
					 La actual situacion comprueba claramente que dejando intacta a la banda de Lee Myung Bak, nunca seran posibles el mejoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas y las labores humanitarias de la cruz roja incluyendo el encuentro de los familiares y parientes separados, al contrario, se impondran a la nacion coreana las desgracias y sufrimientos mas grandes.
					
					 La banda de Lee Myung Bak debe poner fin a su necio complot anti-RPDC al darse clara cuenta de que la campana conflictiva con esta, que se extiende hasta al area del noble humanitarismo, le adelantaria la ignominiosa bancarrota de si misma.
